name: Amazing Facts Educational Template
description: Template for sharing surprising and educational facts in an engaging way
template: Here are {fact_count} {topic_category} facts that will blow your mind! First: {fact_1}. That's {fact_1_impact}! Second: {fact_2}. Imagine {fact_2_context}! And finally: {fact_3}. {fact_3_explanation}. {conclusion_statement}. Which fact surprised you the most? Drop a number 1, 2, or 3 in the comments!

variables.name: topic_category
variables.description: Category or theme of the facts (e.g., 'ocean', 'space', 'history')

variables.name: fact_1_impact
variables.description: Why fact 1 is impressive or surprising

variables.name: fact_2_context
variables.description: Context to help visualize or understand fact 2

variables.name: fact_3_explanation
variables.description: Brief explanation or elaboration on fact 3

variables.name: conclusion_statement
variables.description: Concluding thought about the facts shared

hooks.text: Here are {fact_count} {topic_category} facts that will blow your mind!
Which fact surprised you the most? Drop a number 1, 2, or 3 in the comments!
